column4: [AMOt] PEPPER > Hello MissesUser.
[AQPa] PEPPER > Please tell me, should I move closer, move farther or stay here?
[AQPa] PEPPER > Please tell me, should I move closer, move farther or stay here?
[    ] USER > [u'stay here', 1]
[AMOt] PEPPER > Alright, I will stay here.

[CMPo] PEPPER > It is great to see you again and I am looking forward to spending time with you today. I am especially keen to learn more about you as an individual, including the things you like and value, and also the things that you perhaps don't like so much!
[CMPo] PEPPER > It's important to me to know how I should call you. I want to address you properly
[CQQu] PEPPER > I find that really interesting.  I am aware that some English people prefer to be called by their first names as they think this to be more friendly. May I call you Human?
[    ] USER > yes you can call me
[CMPo] PEPPER > It's important to me to know how I should call you. I want to address you properly
[CMPo] PEPPER > I understand that you will be pleased to be called  Human
[RMOt] PEPPER > Please tell me what I can do for you
[RQPr] PEPPER > As a suggestion, I could  send a message to your friend Roberto
[    ] USER >  yes please
[RQCo] PEPPER > Do you want me to send a message for you?
[    ] USER > [u'yes', 1]
[RMOt] PEPPER > Let's do that!
[AQPa] PEPPER > I can send messages to your friend Roberto, your doctor Carmine and to many other people. Please tell me who you want me to send the message to.
[    ] USER > [u'friend Roberto', 1]

[AMOt] PEPPER > Alright, I'll send a message to your friend Roberto.
[AMOt] PEPPER > Please select the message that you want to send.

[AMOt] PEPPER > Alright.
[AMOt] PEPPER > I've just sent the message you selected to your friend Roberto.
[AQEv] PEPPER > Can you please tell me if you find sending messages useful?
[    ] USER > yes I found it
[AMOt] PEPPER > Thanks for telling me.
[RMOt] PEPPER > I am so happy to be here with you
[CMPo] PEPPER > I like talking about the places that are important to you
